mapper.insert: insert into CXHNWX.T_SURVEY (ID, USR_NAME, DEPARTMENT_NAME, QUESTION_CODE, REPLY_CODE, REPLY_DETAIL, FINISH_DATE, ACT_DATE, IS_VALID, NEW_COLUMN) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{questionCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{replyCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{replyDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{finishDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{actDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{newColumn,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.select: select ID, USR_NAME, DEPARTMENT_NAME, QUESTION_CODE, REPLY_CODE, REPLY_DETAIL, FINISH_DATE, ACT_DATE, IS_VALID, NEW_COLUMN from CXHNWX.T_SURVEY where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
